page.title: 16CHEERIO JENNIE AND ALBIE!
page.content: On the 4th October l985,{Mrs.Jennie} {Teasdale}and her husband 'Albie'will be retiring from their jobs as school caretakers. Jennie's first job after leaving school at l4 was as a baker's delivery girl in Sunderland.She later worked in York City Hospital as a cook until l94O.She then joined the Auxili- ary Territorial Service(ATS)where she trained to become an Aircraft Recog- nition expert or'Plane Spotter'.As a crew member of an anti_aircraft or 'Heavy Ack_Ack'gun battery which was sited near Dalmeny railway station at South Queensferry in Scotland, she recalls the Battery's alarm bell ring- ing to call out the crew on bitterly cold war time nights to 'take post' ready to meet Hitler's squadrons of JU88's and Dorniers. Happy retirement to you both,from Surrey Street School! { N.W.
